messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: What's going on?? (I wouldn't  worry)
messages.msgSnippet: I was getting those quarantined messages the other night.  I wouldn t worry about it.  I think yahoo or some other layer of provider is hiccuping and sending
messages.messageBody:
I was getting those "quarantined" messages the other night. I wouldn't
worry about it. I think yahoo or some other layer of provider is hiccuping
and sending out weird messages. I emailed Joyce about the messages the
other night, and she didn't really know what was going on, but it doesn't
seem to be affecting anyone's ability to post. Weird, though.

Marji

>

>

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: What's going on??/Me too!
messages.msgSnippet: ... saying it was ... that ... about choosing ... I got a similar message and my message posted just fine and all it was was a thank you! Not sure what s up...
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "sorcha_aisling
<sorcha-aisling@i...>" <sorcha-aisling@i...> wrote:
> My last message seems to have posted but I got an email
saying it was
> being quarantined for containing banned content! What does
that
> mean? What's "banned content"? It was just a message
about choosing
> one's reading material and fiction vs. nonfiction.
>
> Sorcha

I got a similar message and my message posted just fine and
all it was was a thank you!

Not sure what's up...

Julie

messages.subject: What's going on??
messages.msgSnippet: My last message seems to have posted but I got an email saying it was being quarantined for containing banned content!  What does that mean?  What s banned
messages.messageBody:
My last message seems to have posted but I got an email saying it was
being quarantined for containing banned content! What does that
mean? What's "banned content"? It was just a message about choosing
one's reading material and fiction vs. nonfiction.

Sorcha
